p.d:
Dazuko (in german: (Da)tei (Zu)griffs (Ko)ntrolle) file-access-control allows you to communicate with the dazuko-kernel module (See: http://www.dazuko.org for details).
It is used to allow or disallow access to a file or directory, based upon the event, the file or directory was accessed. So it is possible to use dazuko to code virus scanners and other security frameworks.
